author: MSNBC
title: 2 Blackhawk helicopters crash near Utah ski resort
description: Two Blackhawk helicopters belonging to the Utah National Guard crashed Tuesday morning during a training exercise, officials said.
content:
Two Blackhawk helicopters belonging to the Utah National Guard crashed Tuesday morning during a training exercise, officials said.
